remarks: Left multiplication by a left regular element does not change the support set of a vector.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ rrgsupp as of 20-Jul-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
rrgval.e $e |- E = ( RLReg ` R ) $.
rrgval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
rrgval.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
rrgval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
rrgsupp.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
rrgsupp.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
rrgsupp.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. E ) $.
rrgsupp.y $e |- ( ph -> Y : I --> B ) $.
rrgsuppOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( `' ( ( I X. { X } ) oF .x. Y ) " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) = ( `' Y " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) ) $.
